name: Ben Jordan: Paranormal Investigator Case 6 - Scourge of the Sea People
name_original: Ben Jordan: Paranormal Investigator Case 6 - Scourge of the Sea People
description: Ben, Simon, and Alice take a vacation in Greece, finding themselves in the remote fishing village of Agia Anna. However, they soon learn that ancient creatures of legend known as the Sea People have been emerging from the ocean at night and dragging villagers down to the depths to eat them.
